titleStmt.title: Prognoma, sive Praesagium Mehemetanorum : primùm de Christianorum calamitatibus, deinde de suae gentis interitu, ex Persica lingua in Latinum sermonem conversum.
Machine-readable text
titleStmt.author: Boehme, Johann

change.item: typed text - structural tagging completed - no semantic tagging - spell check partially performed - no orthographical standardization

div1.head: INDEX ALPHABETICVS RERVM IN HOC OPERE CONTENTARVM.
